short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How's your browser activity treating you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vibes is a poetic response to doom scrolling. This browser extension uses an open-source sentiment analysis library to tell you whether or not your browsing activity is bumming you out.
